item.title: A Research Of The Inconsistency Between WHATWG URL standard And RFC URL standard
item.description: In August 2022, when digging the SRC of Tianrongxin, I found that redacted teaching and training system was used in a site of Tianrongxin Education, so I downloaded the source code of redacted on github and audited it.

item.title: Server-Side MIME Sniff resulting from Go language project containerization
item.description: answerdev/answer is a question and answer platform which is based on the go language, a few weeks ago I audit of the project, found there is an interesting vulnerability in the image upload function
